description: Learn the foundational concepts behind large language models and how they are trained.
tasks: Research the purpose and applications of LLMs
Understand terms like tokenization, embeddings, and transformers
Learn the architecture of popular models like GPT or BERT
Summarize your findings in a shared document
resources: Article: 'Introduction to LLMs' on https://towardsdatascience.com/
Video: 'How Transformers Work' on https://www.youtube.com/
Book: 'Deep Learning for NLP' by Palash Goyal et al.

description: Learn how to access and interact with an LLM using APIs like OpenAI, Hugging Face, or Cohere.
tasks: Create an account on a platform offering LLM APIs
Generate API keys and understand rate limits
Write a script to send a query and process responses
Experiment with different prompts and settings
resources: Documentation: OpenAI API on https://platform.openai.com/
Tutorial: Hugging Face Transformers on https://huggingface.co/
Guide: 'Building Applications with LLMs' on https://docs.example.com/

description: Develop effective prompts to get the most accurate and useful responses from an LLM.
tasks: Learn the principles of crafting clear, unambiguous prompts
Experiment with few-shot and zero-shot examples
Compare outputs from various prompts for the same task
Document your best practices and results
resources: Article: 'Prompt Engineering for LLMs' on https://towardsdatascience.com/
Video: 'Mastering Prompts' on https://www.youtube.com/
Interactive Guide: 'Prompt Engineering for Beginners' on https://learn.prompting.com/

description: Learn how to adapt a large language model to specific tasks by fine-tuning it with custom datasets.
tasks: Understand the difference between fine-tuning and training
Prepare a dataset for fine-tuning (e.g., cleaning and formatting)
Use tools like Hugging Face's Trainer API to fine-tune a model
Evaluate the model's performance on test data
resources: Guide: 'Fine-Tuning with Hugging Face' on https://huggingface.co/
Tutorial: 'How to Fine-Tune GPT Models' on https://openai.com/
Dataset: 'Popular Datasets for NLP' on https://www.kaggle.com/

description: Explore ethical considerations in the development and deployment of LLMs.
tasks: Research biases in training datasets and their impacts
Learn about misuse cases and how to mitigate them
Explore ethical AI frameworks and principles
Present your findings in a team discussion or report
resources: Article: 'Ethical AI Development' on https://ai.googleblog.com/
Report: 'Fairness in AI Models' by MIT on https://www.mit.edu/
Video: 'AI Ethics Explained' on https://www.youtube.com/

description: Create a chatbot application using an LLM to simulate conversational interactions.
tasks: Define the purpose and scope of the chatbot
Set up an LLM API for conversational responses
Implement conversation flow logic in your application
Test and refine the chatbot with user feedback
resources: Guide: 'How to Build a Chatbot' on https://developer.openai.com/
Tutorial: 'Chatbot with Python' on https://realpython.com/
Video: 'Building Chatbots with GPT' on https://www.youtube.com/

description: Learn how to analyze and optimize token usage to create efficient queries for LLMs.
tasks: Understand what tokens are and how they are counted
Calculate the token usage for various inputs and outputs
Experiment with shortening prompts to reduce token count
Optimize a complex query to fit within token limits
resources: Article: 'Understanding Tokenization' on https://platform.openai.com/
Tool: 'Token Counter' on https://openaicalc.com/
Guide: 'Efficient Prompting for LLMs' on https://towardsdatascience.com/

description: Use LLMs to summarize long pieces of text effectively.
tasks: Choose a dataset with long-form text (e.g., articles or essays)
Experiment with different summarization prompts
Evaluate the quality of summaries generated by the LLM
Refine prompts for more concise or detailed summaries
resources: Video: 'Text Summarization with LLMs' on https://www.youtube.com/
Guide: 'Summarization Techniques' on https://huggingface.co/
Dataset: 'CNN/Daily Mail Dataset' on https://huggingface.co/datasets

description: Explore the creative capabilities of LLMs by generating stories, poems, or dialogues.
tasks: Choose a genre or style for creative writing
Write a few example prompts for your chosen style
Generate multiple outputs and select the best examples
Analyze how well the LLM captures tone and creativity
resources: Guide: 'Creative Writing with AI' on https://www.creativeai.com/
Video: 'AI in Literature' on https://www.youtube.com/
Examples: 'Generated Stories with GPT' on https://github.com/openai/examples

description: Use LLMs to perform text classification tasks, such as sentiment analysis or topic detection.
tasks: Understand the basics of text classification
Prepare a labeled dataset for training or testing
Experiment with classification prompts for the LLM
Evaluate the accuracy and refine the process
resources: Guide: 'Text Classification with LLMs' on https://huggingface.co/
Dataset: 'IMDB Sentiment Dataset' on https://ai.stanford.edu/
Video: 'Sentiment Analysis with GPT' on https://www.youtube.com/

description: Learn how to use LLMs for high-quality text translation between multiple languages.
tasks: Research the supported languages for your chosen LLM
Test translations with various sentence structures
Compare LLM translations with traditional translation tools
Refine prompts to improve translation accuracy
resources: Tool: 'DeepL Translator' on https://www.deepl.com/
Video: 'AI for Language Translation' on https://www.youtube.com/
Guide: 'Translation with Hugging Face Transformers' on https://huggingface.co/

description: Learn to identify and resolve issues when LLM outputs do not meet expectations.
tasks: Identify common reasons for poor outputs (e.g., vague prompts)
Test variations of a prompt to isolate the problem
Experiment with techniques like chain-of-thought prompting
Document effective strategies for debugging prompts
resources: Article: 'Prompt Debugging Techniques' on https://www.promptengineering.com/
Tool: 'Prompt Tester' on https://prompttester.io/
Video: 'How to Debug AI Prompts' on https://www.youtube.com/
